description: Visual editor renders secondary `Design` and `Preview` tabs
Visual editor defaults to `Design` on initial load
Switching `Design` -> `Preview` -> `Design` preserves unsaved workspace state
Switching `Visual` -> `Code` -> `Visual` does not break nested tab state
Preview state initializes with valid defaults (source, selection ids, loading/error)
Sample fixture module exports at least three scenarios with unique ids
Each sample fixture satisfies required preview model fields (header, totals, items)
Selecting a sample scenario updates active preview dataset
Existing-invoice selector is hidden while source is `Sample`
Existing-invoice selector is shown while source is `Existing`
Existing invoice search calls paginated fetch with status `all` and expected paging params
Existing invoice search applies query text filtering
Existing invoice search handles pagination transitions correctly
Selecting an existing invoice triggers detail fetch via getInvoiceForRendering
Rapidly changing selected existing invoice does not leave stale detail data in preview
Detail mapping converts DB invoice payload into preview model numeric/string types correctly
Detail mapping handles nullable fields without crashing
Existing-invoice list loading state is visible while searching
Existing-invoice list empty state is shown when no results match
Existing-invoice fetch failures show recoverable error state
Resetting existing invoice selection clears detail payload and rendered output
Preview panel renders with selected sample data in default flow
Preview panel uses designer page/frame scale conventions
Field binding resolution prefers real preview data value when available
Field binding resolution falls back to scaffold placeholder when value is missing
Label metadata text overrides generic label scaffold in preview
Totals components display subtotal/tax/grand-total from selected preview data
Totals components degrade gracefully when one or more totals are absent
Table components render all invoice line items from preview dataset
Table components render valid empty state when selected invoice has no line items
Dynamic-table components render preview rows from selected invoice items
Preview recomputes when node metadata affecting bindings changes
Preview recomputes when relevant layout changes alter rendered structure
Debounce limits preview recompute frequency during rapid edits
Preview mode hides/blocks drag handles and resize affordances
Preview mode prevents selection mutation from click interactions
Preview mode ignores destructive keyboard shortcuts (delete/backspace)
Preview mode does not apply design-time selection opacity deemphasis
Workspace hydration from source-embedded designer state still succeeds with preview feature enabled
Workspace hydration from localStorage fallback still succeeds with preview feature enabled
Saving template while preview tab is active preserves existing save behavior and payload shape
Preview interactions perform no invoice/template write operations
New-template flow shows preview successfully without requiring existing invoices
Preview remains usable even when template name is empty prior to save validation
Preview tab and design tab expose stable automation IDs
Preview source toggle and sample selector expose stable automation IDs
Existing invoice selector and empty/error states expose stable automation IDs
Unit tests verify preview source-state reducer/selectors for all transitions
Integration test covers end-to-end Design -> Preview -> Design workflow with preserved edits
Integration test covers Existing source selection and preview update after detail fetch
Integration test covers switching Sample -> Existing -> Sample and correct output refresh
Documentation update includes preview workflow, source controls, and expected behavior
